titleStmt.title: A sermon, preached before the two high borne and illustrious princes, Fredericke the 5. Prince Elector Palatine, Duke of Bauaria, &c. and the Princesse Lady Elizabeth, &c. Preached in the castle-chappell at Heidelberg the 8. of Iune 1613. being the next day after her Highnesse happy arriuall there: by that reuerend and iudicious diuine, Mr. Abraham Scultetus, his Highnesse chaplaine. Together with a short narration of the Prince Electors greatnes, his country, his receiuing of her Highnesse, accompanied with twe u [sic] other princes, thirty earles, besides an exceeding great number of barons and gentlemen, and eight daies ent rtainement [sic]. Translated out of High Dutch by Ia Meddus D. and one of his Maiesties chaplaines.
titleStmt.author: Scultetus, Abraham, 1566-1624.
Meddus, James, d. 1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Beale for William Welby,

notesStmt.note: The title page is printed as F8.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
